page.title: 06CHURCH/CHAPEL.
page.content: The church is called St Firmins and it is Church of England. The Church has five bells and is hoping to get another one.There is a statue of St Firmin inside the Church.There are two organs.There is an old one behind the new one.Some of the bell ringers found a little stained glass window in the wall and now it is in the big window. The Church used to have a Sunday School.It has a steeple you can go up a little way.The Vicar is Mr Musson. Every Friday night at 7.30p.m. to 9.00p.m. the bell ringers have a bell ringing practise.The Church has a flower and Harvest Festival and they have drama and choral singing at Christmas and Easter. There is a Methodist Chapel. Its Sunday School meets for an hour every week.The Minister is Mr Foster.There is a Youth Fellowship.
